item.title: Shanghai, China's Public Prosecution Office has announced a fraud case involving investment in cryptocurrency, with a total amount involved of over 35 million yuan.
item.description: August 28th. The day before yesterday, the Shanghai Prosecutor's Office held a series of press conferences to provide reports on relevant cases. From 2020 to 2024, the Minhang District Prosecutor's Office in Shanghai received a total of 237 cases involving 375 people for investigation and arrest in connection with financial crimes. They also reviewed and prosecuted 311 cases involving 704 people. Among them, crimes involving virtual currencies, digital collectibles, and using technological innovation as a guise have gradually emerged.In a new type of financial fraud case where the accused used the guise of investing in purchasing virtual currency to deceive victims, the defendant Wu and others, while operating a Shanghai e-commerce company, issued their own "air coin" GDFC without real value and fraudulently obtained more than 35 million RMB from victims. The related funds flowed into the personal accounts of those involved in the case. Their actions constitute the crime of fraud. Cu

item.title: OKX's Japan Branch Okj .Com Receives FSA Regulatory License
item.description: On August 28th, based on the post by OKX CEO Star on the X platform, "Japan is one of the most crucial markets for the adoption of Web3. OKX's Japan branch (Okj.Com) has obtained a comprehensive regulatory license from the Japan Financial Services Agency (FSA) and has ranked within the top three exchanges in Japan. We are also proud to be able to jointly host events such as 'Sei Tokyo Tower Special' with our partners and actively support builders, entrepreneurs, and the community. With the strength of all parties, we are jointly driving the future of blockchain in Japan."

item.title: Publicly traded company LQWD has successfully utilized 19.75 BTC from its Bitcoin treasury to deploy on the Lightning Network
item.description: On August 28th, according to @BTCtreasuries, the publicly listed Canadian company LQWD has transferred 19.75 BTC from its Bitcoin treasury to the Lightning Network.The report indicated that by collecting routing fees, these bitcoins have achieved an effective annual interest rate of up to 24%.

item.title: The Smarter Web Company increased its holdings by 45 bitcoins, bringing the total holdings to 2440 bitcoins.
item.description: On August 28th, the UK-listed company The Smarter Web Company augmented its holdings by 45 bitcoins, resulting in a total holding of 2440 bitcoins.

item.title: IoTeX Receives Strategic Investment from Animoca Brands to Accelerate Real World AI Global Expansion
item.description: On August 28th, the DePIN + AI open ecosystem platform IoTeX announced today that it had received a strategic investment from the Web3 investment firm Animoca Brands. This collaboration goes beyond traditional investment. Animoca Brands will serve as a network validator and ecosystem partner, working together to promote the large-scale application of Real World AI in Asia and globally.Since 2017, IoTeX, a pioneer in the integration of AI and blockchain infrastructure, has been focusing on providing verifiable real-world data for AI systems. It has empowered more than 100 projects and 40 million devices in fields such as transportation, robotics, energy, and healthcare. With a comprehensive data, identity, and AI technology stack, and collaborations with technology giants like Google, Samsung, and ARM, IoTeX has established a strategic high ground in the trillion-dollar AI and data economy. Animoca's participation will accelerate the global commercialization of Real World AI through f

item.title: MEXC Lists Hemi (HEMI) for Pre-Trade Trading
item.description: August 28th. According to official information, MEXC initiated pre-trading for Hemi (HEMI) on August 28, 2025, at 11:00 (in UTC+8 time zone). Users are able to engage in advance trading before the official opening of spot trading for HEMI.

item.title: Ethereum has surged by 20.6% so far in August, on track to mark its fourth consecutive positive August in history
item.description: On August 28th, according to HTX market data, Ethereum has witnessed a 20.6% increase in August so far. As long as it does not lose the aforementioned gain within the next 3 trading days, it will achieve the fourth consecutive August with a positive return in history.Historically, Ethereum has only achieved gains in August in 2017, 2020, and 2021.Moreover, Bitcoin has decreased by 4.58% in August so far, indicating the potential for the fourth consecutive year of decline in August.

item.title: Cryptocurrency artist Beeple is set to develop an art-based PFP project
item.description: On August 28th, the cryptocurrency artist Beeple made a post on the X platform, confirming that he is engaged in developing an art-centered PFP project. He indicated that he is currently designing specific characteristics and is satisfied with the overall progress achieved thus far. He further stated that more details will be disclosed in the future.

item.title: Ethereum Reserve Entity and Spot ETF Holdings Exceed 9% of Current Ethereum Supply
item.description: On August 28th, based on strategicethreserve data, the holdings of the Ethereum Reserve Entity and ETH Spot ETF have exceeded the current Ethereum supply by 9% and now stand at 9.2%. The details are as follows:There are a total of 70 Ethereum Reserve Entities that hold 3.6% of the total ETH supply, which is approximately equivalent to $19.96 billion.The Ethereum Spot ETF holds 5.6% of the total ETH supply, which is approximately equivalent to $30.99 billion.

item.title: Analysis: At the current price, Bitmine would need to invest approximately $19 billion more to reach the "5% Ethereum supply" goal.
item.description: On August 28th, according to CryptoISO, Bitmine is currently reported to be holding more than 1.7 million ETH. In order to reach a reserve target of 5% of Ethereum's supply, approximately an additional 4.3 million ETH would need to be purchased.At the current price ($4534), this transaction would demand an investment of around $19.5 billion. When the ETH price is close to $4200, this cost will be reduced to approximately $18.2 billion. The estimated daily trading volume of ETH is between $30 billion and $50 billion.An analysis indicates that compared to Michael Saylor, who often makes large purchases of $500 million to $1 billion, each time causing the Bitcoin price to immediately rise by more than 2%, Tom Lee is evidently more experienced. Nevertheless, this also means that after the low point of $4060, ETH is most likely to have an "invisible floor" within the range of $4200 to $4400.
